bill.summary:
Combatting Unreasonable Rises and Excessively High Drug Prices Act or the CURE High Drug Prices Act
This bill prohibits price gouging by manufacturers of prescription drugs (including a combination of a drug, device, or biological product) that are covered by a federal health care program. The bill specifies percentage increases in price at which price gouging is presumed.
